assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: DT, AMBA, MERW, JK, KKK, AM, OP, MCdC, CB, KW, RS, JMGA, OB, SK, NN, MW, RAJ are employed at Centogene AG; AR has financial holdings in Centogene AG; WE, MTAR, AAR, WAT, AAlo, MAB, and MA are employees at King Abdulaziz Medical city; AAlh is employee at Prince Sultan Military Medical City; NAS is employee at Johns Hopkins Aramco hospital.
